Detailed Description

AbstractScheduler is the base class for each concrete, OS-dependent Scheduler implementation. It provides some common functionality, like holding a list of AbstractAppContexts.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Creates the AbstractAppContext

Parameters:
cont the AppContainer that runs the AbstractScheduler.

Member Function Documentation

void AbstractScheduler::AddAppContext (  Application *  app  ) 
 

Creates an appropriate AppContext for the Application and adds it to the list of AppContexts. Currently we only support Application attachment BEFORE the Scheduler is being started, and detachment WHEN the Scheduler is being shut down.

Parameters:
app the Application to be added

virtual AbstractAppContext* AbstractScheduler::CreateAppContext (  Application *  app  )  [pure virtual]
 

Creates an appropriate AppContext for the Application. Implementation dependent.

Parameters:
app the Application that should be attached to the created AppContext

Implemented in Scheduler, Scheduler, and SimpleScheduler.

AbstractAppContext * AbstractScheduler::GetAppContext (  const Application *  app  )  const
 

Returns the Application's AppContext

Parameters:
app the Application whose AppContext should be returned

void AbstractScheduler::RemoveAppContext (  const Application *  app  ) 
 

Remove the Application's AppContext from the list of AppContexts. Currently we only support Application attachment BEFORE the Scheduler is being started, and detachment WHEN the Scheduler is being shut down.

Parameters:
app the Application to be removed

virtual void AbstractScheduler::Reschedule (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Takes away control from the currently active Application, and lets the next Application resume.

Implemented in Scheduler, Scheduler, and SimpleScheduler.

virtual void AbstractScheduler::SendMsg (  const Application *  app,
Message &  msg
)  [pure virtual]
 

Wakes up on and sends a Message to the Application. Implementation dependent.

Parameters:
app the receiving Application
msg the Message to be sent

Implemented in Scheduler, Scheduler, and SimpleScheduler.

void AbstractScheduler::ShutDown (   )  [virtual]
 

Shuts down the Scheduler and all associated Applications.

virtual void AbstractScheduler::StartUp (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Starts all AppContexts, which are then ready to receive messages. Implementation dependent.

Implemented in Scheduler, Scheduler, and SimpleScheduler.

virtual void AbstractScheduler::Wait (  const Application *  app,
const Condition &  cond
)  [pure virtual]
 

Takes away control from the Application until the next Messages arrives. Will return once the Condition becomes TRUE.

Parameters:
app the Application that will wait for the Condition
cond the Condition to wait for

Implemented in Scheduler, Scheduler, and SimpleScheduler.
